home.title: Affordable quality services for small businesses
focus.title: Services
focus.title.second: We design and develop simple, secure and of high quality software solutions, mainly oriented to small business.
focus.focus1.title: Mobile apps
focus.focus1.description: We design and develop mobile solutions, based on any platform(IOS, ANDROID,WINDOWS). Optimized development time and cheap economic support because we use the same base code for all platforms.
focus.focus2.title: E-commerce Solutions
focus.focus2.description: We design and develop virtual stores focused on your business needs and oriented to increase your business efficiency and profitability. Sell your products on Internet. In record time you will have your store.
focus.focus3.title: Web Applications
focus.focus3.description: We design and develop personal sites or business used as your card of presentation on Internet.
focus.focus4.title: Support
focus.focus4.description: We give full support after the aplication deployment. You'll get four months free of charge and then we negotiate the maintenance price.
aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.description: We create quality applications oriented to the needs of small business
aboutus.slogan: Innovating and growing with our clients
aboutus.skills.design.description: We specialize in building responsive pages with the most modern browser technologies as HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript
aboutus.skills.development.description: Our web solutions are based on either .NET or Java platforms. We use Xamarin, Cordova/Ionic and Android for mobile development.
aboutus.skills.maintenance.description: Support 24/7. We supervise which hosting, database and platform technology you should use for your solution.
aboutus.panagraph1: We deliver software and services focused on your business needs.
aboutus.panagraph2: We are a professional team with ten years of experience developing software solutions.
aboutus.panagraph3: Our main commitment is to offer quality services and show the expected results from the begining of the software development.
separator.title2: We create your own virtual store in record time with all necessary tools:
separator.tools1: Manage your products (pictures, price, comparisons, reviews, new products)
separator.tools2: Cart (list the products, orders in PDF)
separator.tools4: We migrate your business data into your new system. We export data from old databases, excel books, etc
assistance.section.title1: Need help or a quick answer? Just click on the chat button!
packages.title: Packages
packages.title.subtitle: We have 4 nice packages for you. Check them all and choose the right one for you.
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.title.subtitle: Have any question? Drop us a message. We will get back to you in 24 hours.
contact.form.name: Your Name
contact.form.subject: Subject
contact.message.sucessfully: Your message has been sent successfully.
contact.message.error: Email must be valid and the message must be longer than 1 character.
